availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: A. J. Banta, Jr. (Nicholas Co, KY, resident)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Peter Banta and Judy A. Banta. Married to Martha Robins Piper Banta. Resident of Bourbon County in 1850. Student in Bourbon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, District 1, p. 302A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, Eastern District, p. 664.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Missouri, Johnson County, Madison, p. 557A.
Find A Grave, "A. J. Banta (1847-1898)," Memorial 148031885, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/148031885 (accessed March 20, 2020).
